message.content:
{"id": "4329", 
"title": "No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)", 
"description": "When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly. The issue seems to be related to the initialization of the search dialog with the fully qualified name. Instead, the search should first try to get the Java element and, if that fails, display the element name without the fully qualified name.", 
"OB": "The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. This is not found when searching for declarations. Search via context menu in packages view works.", 
"EB": "When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly. The search should first try to get the Java element and, if that fails, display the element name without the fully qualified name.", 
"SR": "Modify the search functionality in the Package view selection and dialog to first try to get the Java element before displaying the fully qualified name. If the Java element is not found, display the element name without the fully qualified name."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '4329', 'title': 'Bug 4329No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)', 'description': 'Bug 4329No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X) ', 'OB': 'The package view initializes the Search dialog with thefully qualified name. This is not found when searchingfor declarations.Search via context menu in packages view works.== (Java) Search should first try to get the Java element and ifthat fails, display the the element name and not the fully qualifiedname.NOTES: ', 'EB': 'This is not found when searchingfor declarations.Search via context menu in packages view works.== (Java) Search should first try to get the Java element and ifthat fails, display the the element name and not the fully qualifiedname.NOTES: ', 'SR': ''}
